title: 12-Month Final Comprehensive Survey
description: Final comprehensive assessment one year after completing the AI training course.

questions.question: Rate how much AI has transformed your professional life over the past year
How would you rate your current AI expertise level?
options: Intermediate - Comfortable with common AI tools
Expert - Teaching and leading AI initiatives

questions.question: Which career outcomes have you experienced? (Select all that apply)
Provide quantifiable metrics of how AI has impacted your work (time saved, revenue generated, efficiency gains, etc.)
questions.placeholder: Be as specific as possible with numbers and metrics...

questions.question: Share 2-3 detailed case studies of projects where you successfully applied AI
questions.placeholder: For each project, describe: the problem, your AI solution, and the results...

questions.question: How much influence have you had on your organization's AI adoption?
Approximately how many people have you trained or helped with AI?
Which AI tools/platforms do you now consider yourself proficient in?
What are your AI-related goals and plans for the next year?
questions.placeholder: Share your vision for continuing your AI journey...

questions.question: Based on your year-long experience, what improvements would you suggest for the course?
questions.placeholder: What topics should be added, removed, or expanded?

questions.question: On a scale of 0-10, how likely are you to recommend this AI course to others?
Would you like to provide a testimonial about your AI learning journey?
questions.placeholder: This may be used for marketing purposes (with your permission)...
